definition: bus stop
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
surname Shi
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: As I arrived at the bus stop the driver opened his big manual hinged door.
sentences.chinese: 等我到了巴士站，司機用手拉開那道大鉸鏈門。

sentences.english: I still had to continue my uphill walk after taking the pictures to find the bus stop to take me back to Tsuen Wan.
sentences.chinese: 其後還要繼續步行到下一個巴士站才乘巴士回到荃灣。

sentences.english: In Luzhou city proper, there are seven long-distance bus stations in total.
The vehicle mounted the pavement and rammed into a bus stop， and then crashed into a hillside.
sentences.chinese: 失事汽車衝上行人路，撞向巴士站，再撞向山邊。

sentences.english: Excuse me, where is the nearest shuttle bus stop to Houjie?
sentences.chinese: 請問，到厚街最近的穿梭巴士站在哪？

sentences.english: The Museum is opposite to the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 博物館位於巴士站對面。

sentences.english: By the time she reached the bus stop for her homeward trip, her stomach was one big knot.
sentences.chinese: 她走到巴士站，準備搭車回家，肚子又餓得要命。

sentences.english: Finally, a practice of bus-stop optimization is performed for some bus-stop in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 最後，這種做法在南京的一些巴士站的巴士站優化。

sentences.english: Finally, a practice of bus-stop optimization is performed for some bus-stop in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 最後，這種做法在南京的一些巴士站的巴士站優化。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I'm looking for the airport bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我在找機場的巴士站。

sentences.english: I was expecting you at the bus stop!
sentences.chinese: 我本來是在巴士站等你們的。

sentences.english: Bus stops along Kwun Tong Road may be reorganised in the wake of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 觀塘道一帶巴士站可能要重組，以防意外再度發生。

sentences.english: The place is on Fang Cao Street which is near the No. 11 bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是關於曹芳街11號附近的巴士站。

sentences.english: Mike is waiting at the bus stop for the bus to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 邁克在巴士站等待巴士的到來。

sentences.english: Yamagata Miyagi Prefectural to go to the bus stop, from yesterday overcrowded.
sentences.chinese: 宮城縣廳前去往山形的巴士站，從昨天開始人滿爲患。

sentences.english: Pearl walked away down the street and towards the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 於是，珀爾沿着街繼續朝巴士站走去。

definition: bus (loanword)/motor coach
Hong Kong LRT (Light Rail Transit) (abbr. for 輕便鐵路|轻便铁路)
to ride as a passenger (in a car, boat, plane etc)
Star Ferry terminal, Hong Kong
minibus/microbus
Coloane, an island of Macao
bus information board/street sign for a bus stop/bus stop
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
Mong Kok (area in Hong Kong)
Taipa, an island of Macau
Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong
Tin Hau MTR station (Eastern District, Hong Kong Island)
rapid transit/subway
Tsuen Wan district of New Territories, Hong Kong
terminus
Kowloon Motor Bus (KMB) (abbr. for 九龍巴士|九龙巴士)
